1425040.name: Chaordic - Nature Wallpaper pack
1425040.description:
Beautiful Wallpaper drawn for the game Chaordic. The Wallpaper itself is the author's concept of the world of Chaordic remade for the Anime style.
Wallpaper has warm, light and very pleasant tones.
Image detail reaches up to 4K resolution [3840x2160 px].

The package includes 9 Images for your desktop.

The recommended screen ratio is 16:9 (not necessarily):
1920×1080 : Full HD 1080p
2560×1440 : WQXGA / Quad HD 1440p
3840×2160 : 4K UHD (Ultra HD): 2160p

The image package can be found in the Chaordic game folder.
For Example: Q:\Steam\steamapps\common\Chaordic\DLC Chaordic - Nature Wallpaper pack
1425040.supported_languages: 英语, 俄语, 德语, 韩语, 乌克兰语
